languages.text: {n}Соломон не меняется в лице, приводя приговор в исполнение. Таддуа Кровавые Руки лишается жизни, не издав ни звука.{/n}
{n}There is no change in Solomorne's expression as he performs the execution. Taddua the Scorched expires without making a sound.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон не меняется в лице, приводя приговор в исполнение. Таддуа Кровавые Руки лишается жизни, не издав ни звука.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙的表情没有一丝变化，执行了死刑。“被灼之人”塔杜亚一声不吭，倒在了地上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no change in Solomorne's expression as he performs the execution. Taddua the Scorched expires without making a sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙的表情没有一丝变化，执行了死刑。“被灼之人”塔杜亚一声不吭，倒在了地上。{/n}
{n}索罗蒙的表情没有一丝变化，执行了死刑。乌苏斯·血手一声不吭，倒在了地上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La expresión de Solomorne permanece inalterable mientras ejecuta la sentencia. Taddua el Calcinado expira sin hacer un solo ruido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no change in Solomorne's expression as he performs the execution. Taddua the Scorched expires without making a sound.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İnfazı gerçekleştirirken Solomorne'un ifadesinde hiçbir değişiklik olmuyor. Dağlayıcı Taddua, ses çıkaramadan can veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no change in Solomorne's expression as he performs the execution. Taddua the Scorched expires without making a sound.{/n}

languages.text: {n}処刑を実行しても、ソロモーンの表情に変化はない。 焼かれし者タッドゥアは音も立てずに死ぬ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no change in Solomorne's expression as he performs the execution. Taddua the Scorched expires without making a sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}処刑を実行しても、ソロモーンの表情に変化はない。アーサス・ブラッドハンズは音も立てずに死ぬ。{/n}
{n}処刑を実行しても、ソロモーンの表情に変化はない。アーサス・ブラッドハンズは音も立てずに死ぬ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'expression de Solomorne demeure impassible alors qu'il procède à l'exécution et Taddua le Brûlé rend l'âme sans un bruit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no change in Solomorne's expression as he performs the execution. Taddua the Scorched expires without making a sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression de Solomorne demeure impassible alors qu'il procède à l'exécution et Taddua le Brûlé rend l'âme sans un bruit.{/n}
{n}L'expression de Solomorne demeure impassible alors qu'il procède à l'exécution et Ursus Mains-Sanglantes rend l'âme sans un bruit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne zeigt keinerlei Gefühlsregung, während er die Hinrichtung durchführt. Taddua der Verbrannte stirbt, ohne ein Geräusch von sich zu geben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no change in Solomorne's expression as he performs the execution. Taddua the Scorched expires without making a sound.{/n}
